column1: Little Goat Diner////Service/Atmosphere: The Little Goat decor takes quintessential American diner items and decor and gives them a serious upgrade. While still casual
column4: and full of natural lighting during the day. During the summer they also have outdoor seating. The service here is consistently top-notch: fast
column6: and very friendly. As a bonus
column7: they also have a gluten-free menu and do their best to accommodate food allergies or restrictions.
